title: Which control preexisting differences in groups

content.prompt: Dr. Nance studies the effects of psychoactive drugs on memory and decision-making. When conducting research in this area, Dr. Nance must be sure that people's previous experiences with psychoactive drugs are taken into account. Which of the following procedures is intended to control for preexisting differences between the groups of participants in an experiment?

skill.text: 2.A: Determine the type of research design(s) used in a given study.
